Dear ##NickName##,

Thank you for coming to Crosspoint and checking out our Kids Ministry and worship. I hope your children had a great time at Crosspoint Kids. We strive to make this the very best experience for your children and for you. To help us grow, would you offer us some feedback by taking THIS 3 minute anonymous survey?

I am a parent of two kids and understand your desires to have a safe, fun, and learning environment for your children. Our "First Check" security system helps us to be sure we can provide the best care for your children. All of our Crosspoint Kids staff and volunteers have had background checks and we follow very strict guidelines to adhere to our "Safe Environment" policy to keep our children safe.

Our Kids Ministry leadership provide regular trainings for our volunteers to increase the level of excellence that we are giving to your children. Most importantly all of our children's volunteers and staff love Jesus and love children!

We place the highest value on children and youth at our church and we hope that you were able to see that in our facility, staff, volunteers, and attention given to your children and your family. Thank you for the opportunity to minister to you and trusting us with your most precious possession--your children!

I hope that you will come back this next weekend and enjoy our Crosspoint Kids Worship experiences on Sunday. There are life groups for adults throughout the week, as well as Celebrate Recovery on Thursday evening. Dinner is also served on Thursdays at 4:45 p.m.

Please feel free to call the church for more information or assistance. We would also recommend that you visit our website for more in-depth information about all the ministries of our church as well as contact information for all our staff. The web address is: crosspoint.church

See you Sunday,

Greg McKinnon, Crosspoint Executive Pastor
